1.0.name: wordpress/mulubox
1.0.description:
Get the same shopping functionality that the pros use. Automatically add commerce to every post with the muluBox plugin. Simply continue writing and mulu turns your words into a shoppable boutique.

Mulu scans each post you publish, identifies the products you mention, and pulls them together from merchants across the web. When your readers click on a product, the retailer product page opens in a new tab and you get paid for the click. Payment varies, based on the percentage of your clicks that convert to sales.

Because of the magic behind its extraction algos, mulu correctly identifies almost every product you mention, earning bloggers an average 12x increase compared to affiliate programs.

Mulu works on all kinds of content, from beauty and fashion to news and pop culture to home improvement and crafts, even tech and sports/fitness.

How it works

Check out the demo at mulu.me to see how muluBox would perform
